description: The fishing trawler sank in the Arctic waters of the Barents Sea with 19 people on board.
title: Onega: Russian fishing crew missing after trawler sinks in Barents Sea
title_page: Onega: Russian fishing crew missing after trawler sinks in Barents Sea - BBC News
maintext: A nearby vessel was able to rescue two members of the Onega's crew and recover one body, before the trawler went down near the Novaya Zemlya archipelago.
